required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Five-year Outcomes of Rapid-deployment Aortic Valve Replacement With the Edwards Intuity TM Valve
clinical_study.official_title: Five-year Outcomes of Rapid-deployment Aortic Valve Replacement With the Edwards Intuity TM Valve: a Single-center Prospective Study

brief_summary.textblock:
Objectives:
This report presents 5-year outcomes of the rapid-deployment Edwards Intuity TM valve in a single-center prospective study.
Methods:
All consecutive patients who underwent an aortic valve replacement with an Edwards Intuity TM bioprosthesis at La Timone Hospital, Marseille, France, were prospectively included between July 2012 and June 2015 and were followed for 5 years. The primary outcome was overall mortality at 5 years.

arm_group.arm_group_label: patients who underwent an aortic valve replacement

intervention.description: aortic valve replacement with an Edwards Intuity TM bioprosthesis
intervention.arm_group_label: patients who underwent an aortic valve replacement

study_pop.textblock: 170 consecutive patients who underwent an aortic valve replacement with an Edwards Intuity TM bioprosthesis at La Timone Hospital, Marseille, France, were prospectively included between July 2012 and June 2015 and were followed for 5 years.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Consecutive patients implanted by the Intuity TM bioprosthesis
- For severe aortic valve stenosis or severe aortic regurgitation
- Including reoperation and combined surgery
- Between July 2012 and June 2015
Exclusion Criteria:
- absence of patient's authorization for anonymous publication of their clinical data for research purposes
